extracted_clauses: The Contractor guarantees 99.9% uptime for all services under this SLA.
Project timeline is divided into three milestones over 6 months.
Milestone 1: Requirements gathering - 30 days from project start.
Milestone 2: Development and testing - 90 days from Milestone 1 completion.
Milestone 3: Deployment and go-live - 60 days from Milestone 2 completion.
Response time for critical issues: within 1 hour as per SLA requirements.
All deliverables must meet the timeline specified in the project schedule.
